### Ingest
#### year and cases

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "leprosy-decline/leprosy-decline.csv"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)

df <- read.csv(url, header = TRUE)
head(df, n=10)

```


### Wrangle
#### parse_number


```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}

#Converting the new.cases columns to numeric
df_wrangle <- df
df_wrangle$new.cases <-parse_number(df_wrangle$new.cases)
head(df_wrangle, n=10)

```


### Plot 
#### area with gradient


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    plot.title = element_text(color = "#174e5a", size = 14, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "#2a656f", size = 8),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#545951", size = 8),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    # axis.text.x = element_text(vjust = 12),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#92d8d4"),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#92d8d4"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), # remove minor gridlines
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # remove x (vertical) gridlines
    legend.title = element_blank(), # remove legend title
)


grad_1_df <- data.frame(yintercept = seq(0, 800000, length.out = 200), 
                      alpha = seq(0.3, 0, length.out = 200))

v1 <- ggplot(df_wrangle, aes(x=year, y=new.cases)) + 
  geom_area(fill="#ff8663",color = "#4d4d4d", alpha=0.8, size=1 ) +
  geom_hline(data = grad_1_df, aes(yintercept = yintercept, alpha = alpha), 
             size = 2.5, colour = "white") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1995,2006,2018),labels=c(1995,2006,2018)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=seq(0, 800000, 200000)) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = 2), alpha = 0.02) +
  scale_alpha_identity() + 
  labs( title = "Leprosy Decline",
        subtitle = "Cases worldwide",
        caption = "source: Leprosy Review, World Health Organisation") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9)))

```


### Plot
#### with annotations


```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide', fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

grad_2_df <- data.frame(yintercept = seq(1995, 2018, length.out = 200), 
                      alpha = seq(0.3, 0, length.out = 200))

# Plot
v2 <- ggplot(df_wrangle, aes(x=year, y=new.cases)) + 
  geom_area(fill="#ff8663",color = "#4d4d4d", alpha=0.8, size=1 ) +
  geom_vline(data = grad_2_df, aes(xintercept = yintercept, alpha = alpha), 
             size = 2.5, colour = "white") +

  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1995,2006,2018),labels=c(1995,2006,2018)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=seq(0, 800000, 200000)) +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = 2017), alpha = 0.02) +
  scale_alpha_identity() + 
  #scale_fill_continuous() +
  labs( title = "Leprosy Decline",
        subtitle = "Cases worldwide",
        caption = "source: Leprosy Review, World Health Organisation") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v2, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9)))

```


### Plot
#### with annotations


```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide', fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

v3 <- v2 + annotate("text", x = as.Date("1-1-2020", "%m-%d-%Y"), y = 600, 
             label = "  January 1st", 
             hjust = "left", vjust = 0, color = "#458cb6", size = 4, fontface = 2) +
    annotate("text", x = as.Date("7-4-2020", "%m-%d-%Y"), y = max(df$Count), 
             label = "  July 4th", 
             hjust = "left", vjust = 1, color = "#458cb6", size = 4, fontface = 2)

girafe(ggobj = v3, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))
  
```
